channel.title: Espanol cosa on Homeopatía
channel.description: Recent content in Espanol cosa on Homeopatía

item.title: Acerca de mi - Homeopatía en Dénia, Orba y Pedreguer
item.description: Acerca de mi I was born in 1980 in Bielefeld, Germany. On account of my own disease, at the age of 13 I already had contact with natural therapies, among them homeopathy. Thanks to a breakthrough with the homeopathic treatment I am able to enjoy my life to the fullest. In Germany I completed an intensive course encompassing conventional medicine and homeopathy. In 2012 I passed my exam before the public health department.

item.title: Aplicaciones - Homeopatía en Dénia, Orba y Pedreguer
item.description: Applications One of the frequent questions is “Is there something for my joints?” Or “Can you treat my back pain?” And similar questions about a whole host of other conditions like hypertension, migraine, heartburn, irritable bowel syndrome, rashes, anxiety, depression, insomnia etc. and symptoms that couldn’t be diagnosed. The answer is: generally yes! Most conditions can be treated with homeopathy. How far an improvement can go and whether the disease can be cured depends on the individual person.
